name: dev.yarnspinner.unity
description: Yarn Spinner is the friendly tool for interactive conversations. Write your dialogue in a simple programming language that's designed to be straightforward for writers and powerful for programmers, and then attach it to your scenes to power your conversations.

samples.description: If you're new to Yarn Spinner, start with this demo. A simple conversation with branching, variables, and voice-over.
A side-scrolling conversation that demonstrates localisation and voiceovers.
A basic scene that demonstrates the alternative 9-sliced prefabs for the built in views
A template for creating a visual novel with extensive use of Yarn Commands.
Code for positioning speech bubbles dynamically above characters in a 3D (or 2D) game world.
A text message style phone conversation template.
How to use Cinemachine to create a custom dialogue view that can do a shot-reverse-shot conversation camera... requires the Cinemachine package.
How to use TMP input fields to get user input into Yarn variables.
Demonstrates how to use the Markup Palettes
Demonstrates how to use the pausing markup to pause in the middle of line
An advanced sample covering the necessary elements to create yourself if you want to take full control over Yarn Spinner.
